definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: It is a competing format to Dolby Digital which was released about a year after.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个稍后一年发布具有竞争力的杜比数字格式。

sentences.english: Dolby noise reduction manufactured under the license from Dolby Laboratories Licensing Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 杜比噪音减低系经杜比实验证明公司授权制造。

sentences.english: Dolby noise reduction manufactured under the license from Dolby Laboratories Licensing Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 杜比噪音减低系经杜比实验证明公司授权制造。

sentences.english: Dolby and the double-D symbol are registered trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 和双D标志是杜比实验室的注册商标。

sentences.english: The Dolby digital plugins are also integrated for more fun with musics .
sentences.chinese: 杜比数字插件也集成了很多有意思的音乐。

sentences.english: The double-D symbol is a registered trademark of Dolby Laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 双D标志是杜比实验室的注册商标。

sentences.english: I guess a mobile user may only be interested in Dolby Headphones mode among all of this.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想可能是一个移动用户感兴趣杜比耳机模式各本。

sentences.english: IIC-bus controlled dual Dolby B-type noise reduction circuit for playback applications.
sentences.chinese: IIC总线控制回放应用双杜比B型降噪电路。

sentences.english: Supports files with Dolby Digital audio.
sentences.chinese: 支持档案与杜比数字音频。

sentences.english: Thank you Mr. Dolby for giving us such an ardent speech.
sentences.chinese: 感谢杜比先生热情洋溢的致辞。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
the feeling of actually being there
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
